title: Prime Rectangular Flat Land for Sale in Kandy
details:
Prime block of land rectangular in shape consisting two blocks attached together consisting 107P having road frontage from 3 sides in Kandy now available for sale.

The property is located off Peradeniya/Colombo/Kandy Road with only 200 meters to the said road.It is only 3Km to Kandy Town/1.90Km to the Kandy Railway Station and its 4Km to Peradeniya Town.

The land is the only large parcel available in the Kandy City Limits for sale.

Owners quoted Price LKR 4 Million Per Perch.

This block is ideally suited for a corporate bungalow.

INTERESTED PARTIES PLEASE COMMUNICATE VIA E-MAIL ONLY
